Deploying to Github pages

31 Aug 2013 – Mumbai

Create an account in the github.com . After creating the account create an empty repo of name username.github.io . where username is the github username.

In your site directory

$ git int
## initialises the repo
$ git add .
## adds all the files to the repo
$ git commit -m "message"
##git commits to the repo
$ git remote add origin git@github.com:Username/username.github.io
## add the remote repo
$ git push -u origin master

Now go to the github website and navigate to your github repo page and go to settings tab. You will see something like this.

Now go to the url, your blog will be up in 10 minutes.

Hurray , you have created your blog!!!!
